name: PlanetMania
0:
”Alexa, open Planet Mania”
”give me information about Sun”
”tell me about Earth”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: planet mania
des: Planet Mania is a learning tool for kids and adults alike about some fruitful information about the solar system. Ask for information about a particular planet in the solar system and you will have some amazing facts. Evolve yourself and get to learn a bit more about the giant Solar system through this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
